timeline.bodyText: There are a lot of other 3rd party jars are included to dependency block (e.g. for the latest version https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/com/amazonaws/aws-java-sdk/1.11.701/aws-java-sdk-1.11.701.pom), but you're adding only 2 dependencies. Could you please confirm that it shouldn't cause any ClassNotFound errors?
